column4: Ok now I finally got into the livecd, tried to play a video in that experience ubuntu folder, then everything froze. :/ seems this distribution doesn't like me. :( What can be the reason for this crash/freeze?
umm too slow of a cdrom player so by the time it needs a library from cdrom it freezes?
could be so, would I still be able to install ubuntu?
i thnk you will still be able to install, but why not reboot on same liveCD and then start a fresh install instead of after a crash
